events.message: I received the wrong item and want to request a refund because this is not what I ordered and it's unusable for me.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the customer.
Hello! I'm Lisa from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund faster.
Here is my order number 12345 and attached is the photo showing the incorrect item delivered instead of the shoes I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a pre-paid return shipping label to send back the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution! I appreciate the pre-paid return label offer.
Your refund has been processed and you will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if you need any more help with your recent order.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us and we hope to serve you again soon.
